text: Write a 'Hello, World!' program in a language you've never used before.
Explain a complex programming concept (like closures or promises) using only emojis.
Center a div using a method you've never tried.
Refactor a piece of your old code without changing its functionality.
Write a function that has a bug, then write a comment explaining the 'feature'.
Find a funny coding meme and share it with a non-developer friend. See if they get it.
Spend 15 minutes trying to code with your monitor turned off. Good luck.
Rename all your variables in a small project to names of your favorite foods.
